staxel.village.dialogue.job.MayorWorkPla: Documents keep piling up at my house.
The lack of a ^c:1486b0;town hall^c:pop; is wreaking havoc on my workflow.
At this rate, the opposition might pull ahead!
When will the ^c:1486b0;town hall^c:pop; repairs begin?
I knew I should have hired a better contractor...
